Fiftyone weeks ago Stony Brook Football hosted Sacred Heart University at Kenneth P PERIOD LaValle Stadium and lost  PERIOD On Saturday the Seawolves flipped the script and dominated the Pioneers in nearly every aspect of their  victory PERIOD
